name: ReplicationGroup
shortDesc: The AWS::ElastiCache::ReplicationGroup resource creates an Amazon ElastiCache replication group. A replication group is a collection of cache clusters, where one of the clusters is a primary read-write cluster and the others are read-only replicas.

properties.name: AutomaticFailoverEnabled
properties.desc: Indicates whether Multi-AZ is enabled. When Multi-AZ is enabled, a read-only replica is automatically promoted to a read-write primary cluster if the existing primary cluster fails. If you specify true, you must specify a value greater than 1 for the NumCacheNodes property. By default, AWS CloudFormation sets the value to true.

properties.name: AutoMinorVersionUpgrade
properties.desc: Currently, this property isn't used by ElastiCache.

properties.name: CacheNodeType
properties.desc: The compute and memory capacity of nodes in the node group. To see valid values, see CreateReplicationGroup in the Amazon ElastiCache API Reference Guide.

properties.name: CacheParameterGroupName
properties.desc: The name of the parameter group to associate with this replication group.

properties.name: CacheSecurityGroupNames
properties.desc: A list of cache security group names to associate with this replication group. If you specify the SecurityGroupIds property, do not specify this property; you can specify only one.

properties.name: CacheSubnetGroupName
properties.desc: The name of a cache subnet group to use for this replication group.

properties.name: Engine
properties.desc: The name of the cache engine to use for the cache clusters in this replication group. Currently, you can specify only redis.

properties.name: EngineVersion
properties.desc: The version number of the cache engine to use for the cache clusters in this replication group.

properties.name: NotificationTopicArn
properties.desc: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic to which notifications are sent.

properties.name: NumCacheClusters
properties.desc: The number of cache clusters for this replication group. If automatic failover is enabled, you must specify a value greater than 1.

properties.name: Port
properties.desc: The port number on which each member of the replication group accepts connections.

properties.name: PreferredCacheClusterAZs
properties.desc: A list of Availability Zones (AZs) in which the cache clusters in this replication group are created.

properties.name: PreferredMaintenanceWindow
properties.desc: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur. Use the following format to specify a time range: ddd:hh24:mi-ddd:hh24:mi (24H Clock UTC). For example, you can specify sun:22:00-sun:23:30 for Sunday from 10 PM to 11:30 PM.

properties.name: ReplicationGroupDescription
properties.desc: The description of the replication group.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.desc: A list of Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) security groups to associate with this replication group. Use this property only when you are creating a replication group in a VPC. If you specify the CacheSecurityGroupNames property, do not specify this property; you can specify only one.

properties.name: SnapshotArns
properties.desc: A single-element string list that specifies an ARN of a Redis .rdb snapshot file that is stored in Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3). The snapshot file populates the node group. The Amazon S3 object name in the ARN cannot contain commas. For example, you can specify arn:aws:s3:::my_bucket/snapshot1.rdb.

properties.name: SnapshotRetentionLimit
properties.desc: The number of days that ElastiCache retains automatic snapshots before deleting them.

properties.name: SnapshotWindow
properties.desc: The time range (in UTC) when ElastiCache takes a daily snapshot of your node group. For example, you can specify 05:00-09:00.

attributes.name: PrimaryEndPoint.Address
attributes.desc: The DNS address of the primary read-write cache node.

attributes.name: PrimaryEndPoint.Port
attributes.desc: The number of the port that the primary read-write cache engine is listening on.

attributes.name: ReadEndPoint.Addresses
attributes.desc: A string with a list of endpoints for the read-only replicas. The order of the addresses map to the order of the ports from the ReadEndPoint.Ports attribute.

attributes.name: ReadEndPoint.Ports
attributes.desc: A string with a list of ports for the read-only replicas. The order of the ports map to the order of the addresses from the ReadEndPoint.Addresses attribute.

attributes.name: ReadEndPoint.Addresses.List
attributes.desc: A list of endpoints for the read-only replicas. The order of the addresses map to the order of the ports from the ReadEndPoint.Ports.List attribute.

attributes.name: ReadEndPoint.Ports.List
attributes.desc: A list of ports for the read-only replicas. The order of the ports map to the order of the addresses from the ReadEndPoint.Addresses.List attribute.
